name: BING BANG TINY SKULL CUFF GOLD
description:
Founded in 2002, Bing Bang has captured the hearts, necklines and wrists of downtown darlings who are both salty & sweet, by pairing a Punk Rock sensibility with elegant Victorian femininity, to create a unique line of unforgettable keepsakes.  Each piece is fashioned in the brand’s signature aesthetic with layered sterling and brass chains, mixed metal finishes, curious charms & distressed lockets, often with bits of turquoise, pearls or Swarovski crystals.

Bing Bang by Anna Sheffield.

Six tiny skulls adorn this hand hammered bar cuff, perfect for stacking!

Brass and oxidized silver plate.

name: COSABELLA SWEETIE SOFT BRA ANTHRACITE
description:
Cosabella is famous for its use of vibrant, cutting-edge colors and it believes that a woman’s lingerie should be able to reflect her every mood.

Cosabella.

Wireless, lycra stretch bra with scallop edge design.

78% Polyammide, 10% Viscose, 12% Elastam.

name: STANDARD SILK TEE
description:
The Standard silk tee is made from 100% silk vintage garments, and is a unique one-of-a-kind piece. 

All vintage is sent out for a special washing process, and then sized and labeled before it is available for sale. Due to the fact that all pieces are one-of-a-kind vintage items, no two will be exactly alike, so please allow for slight variations in color, texture, finishing and weight.   

Our top priority is making sure our customers are happy with our product. If you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase, please feel free to contact your concierge or return it- on us!

People go nuts for our Standard Silk Tee’s. Made from vintage silk garments sourced in the USA, it’s a classic shape with a button keyhole detail in the back. I don’t even need to suggest what to wear it with because you literally can’t fail with this shirt. I dare you to find a 100% silk shirt for this price.

Please note.  Styles may vary slightly in color, texture, finishing or print from the item pictured on our site. Please read About Me for more details.

name: MONOI TIPANIE OIL
description:
Monoi Oil is simply coconut oil with fragrance extracted from tropical flowers. This oil is the closest oil in nature to the oils found in your scalp and skin. The oil, known for it's special properties, is used as a skin moisturizer for dry skin, as a sun tanning oil, and as a conditioner for hair and scalp. The soap is a French milled soap using Coconut oil and palm oil as the primary ingredients. It's like a vacation in a bottle. 

Soft skin is the best accessory. Get your body moisturized and ready to slip into something amazing. Scented with the Tahitian Gardenia, or "Tiare" flower, Monoi oil is made by macerating Tiare flowers and extracting the fragrance by soaking in oil. A dried Tiare flower is placed in each bottle . Use as dark tanning oil, skin moisturizer, before & after shampoo to add sheen and prevent dry hair, as a bath oil, and as subtle perfume.

Comes in 4 fl. oz (120 ml.) bottles.

name: MONOI TIARE TAHITI OIL
description:
Monoi Tiare Tahiti Oil is simply coconut oil with fragrance extracted from tropical flowers. This oil is the closest oil in nature to the oils found in your scalp and skin.  The oil, known for it's special properties, is used as a skin moisturizer for dry skin, as a sun tanning oil, and as a conditioner for hair and scalp. The soap is a French milled soap using Coconut oil and palm oil as the primary ingredients.   It's like a vacation in a bottle. 

This is simply a sunscreened version of the original Monoi Tiare Tahiti. Since all oils strengthen the effect of the sun on your skin, this oil has an SPF of 2.

4 fl. oz (120 ml)

name: MONOI SANDALWOOD
description:
The exotic scent of sandalwood is perfect for the man or woman who enjoy a non-floral fragrance

 

Want to get in on the secret.  Try the Monoi Oil.  Basically, Tahitian babes have been using this scented oil to condition their skin and hair, as well as to make sure they smell amazing.  Consider it babe oil.  This oil is all natural made from Tahitian Coconut Oil and Tiare Flowers.  Straight from Tahiti to your body.  What goes better with a little dress than amazing skin?

name: MONOI TAHARI TAHITI OIL
description:
Monoi Tahari Tahiti Oil is simply coconut oil with fragrance extracted from tropical flowers. This oil is the closest oil in nature to the oils found in your scalp and skin. The oil, known for it's special properties, is used as a skin moisturizer for dry skin, as a sun tanning oil, and as a conditioner for hair and scalp. The soap is a French milled soap using coconut oil and palm oil as the primary ingredients. It's like a vacation in a bottle. 

Soft skin is the best accessory. Get your body moisturized and ready to slip into something amazing. An exotic yellow flower from the South Pacific and Asia, the Ylang-Ylang is blended with Tiare for a heavenly scent. Use as dark tanning oil, skin moisturizer, before & after shampoo to add sheen and prevent dry hair, as a bath oil, and as subtle perfume.

4 fl. oz (120 ml)

name: JAO BRAND GOE OIL
description:
Jao Brand Goe Oil is a combination of 28 plant fruit and flower oils and butters. Lightly scented with Monoi from Tahiti. It goes into the skin quickly and leaves it feeling incredibly smooth

Want to feel baby soft?  That's easy, just try Goe Oil.  This moisturizing oil is made from a combination of 28 plant, fruit, and flower oils and butters so, it is jam packed with things to make your skin incredibly soft, smooth, and healthy.  Good skin goes with every outfit.

3 oz

100% natural plants, fruits, and flowers.

No parabens, sulphates, PER's propylene glycol, TEA, DEA, phthalates, mineral oil, silicones, or synthetic fragrance.

Made in the USA!

name: 19 CANDLES SWEETGRASS
description:
Situated along the coast between Santa Monica and Malibu, Topanga Canyon is a surprisingly wild place. Coyotes, Rattlesnakes, Hawks and (down where I live) Frogs are the primary residents here, and they enjoy a very un-city lifestyle, despite being in close proximity to Los Angeles. 

Topanga is also known for being the home to free-thinking writers, artists, actors, musicians, hippies,tweakers, eccentrics and some off-the-grid folks too. It all makes for an interesting place to call home, and when you read up on the history of the place, it’s apparently always been this way. Topanga is the inspiration for 19Candles.

Earth Day is a big event in Topanga Canyon. Each April 22nd brings the free-spirited to a hilltop field for two days of music, food and environmental consciousness. This formula was inspired by that sunny spring weekend, sitting in the grass.

name: RIO TANK
description:
Refashioned is made from vintage garments or dead stock fabrics, so they are all unique one-of-a-kind pieces. These items are sent out for a special washing process, and then carefully reworked.  

No two are exactly alike due to the nature of the raw materials we use. Styles may vary slightly in color, texture, finishing or weight from the item pictured on our site. We group our prints and colors by type, so you will not get exactly the same item as pictured. You will however get something very close!  

Our top priority is making sure our customers are happy with our product. If you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase, please feel free to contact your concierge or return it- on us!

Because everyone needs the perfect tank.  We've got your basics covered and this is another perfect example.  Made of deadstock rayon jersey, the Rio has a scoop front and back.

Please note.  Styles may vary slightly in color, texture, finishing or print from the item pictured on our site. Please read About Me for more details.

name: AMAZON SKIRT
description:
This is made from surplus fabric so they are all unique one-of-a-kind pieces.  These items are sent out for a special washing process, and then carefully reworked.  No two are exactly alike due to the nature of the raw materials we use.  Styles may vary slightly in color, texture, finishing or weight from the item pictured on our site.  We group our prints and colors by type, so you will not get exactly the same item as pictured.  You will get something very similar!

Mini skirt with fringe detailing and exposed zipper in back.  Made from surplus rayon and fringe fabric.

Model is 5'9" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size small:

Length- 14"

Waist- 26.5"

Fits true to size.

Made in the USA.

name: MADE HER THINK DOUBLE WIRE CHAIN RING
description:
Made Her Think is a fusion of Mexican folk art, the Victorian Era, and art deco.  Designer Meredith Kahn mixes together chains, charms and pieced together objects to create her line.

Sterling silver thin wire bands connected by chain.  

Fits above and below the knuckle.

Made in New York City.

name: LUIGI JUMPER
description:
Refashioned is made from vintage garments or dead stock fabrics, so they are all unique one-of-a-kind pieces. These items are sent out for a special washing process, and then carefully reworked.  

No two are exactly alike due to the nature of the raw materials we use. Styles may vary slightly in color, texture, finishing or weight from the item pictured on our site. We group our prints and colors by type, so you will not get exactly the same item as pictured. You will however get something very close!  

Our top priority is making sure our customers are happy with our product. If you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase, please feel free to contact customer love or return it - on us!

The Luigi the most sexy disco jumper on planet earth. Halter, wide-leg jumpsuit, with adjustable spaghetti straps and an open back. Think Bianca Jagger and Jerry Hall. This jumper might inspire you to take over the world. Not saying, just saying.

Please note.  Styles may vary slightly in color, texture, finishing or print from the item pictured on our site. Please read About Me for more details.

name: JENNIFER FISHER SPIKE CUFF
description:
From a simple dog tag in 14k yellow gold came an extensive line of over 4000 charms, with four types of colored gold and various diamond options, all inspired by elements and influences from Jennifer's life. The collection also includes stacked gold cuff bracelets, double finger rings adorned with black and white diamonds, hoop earrings, and hand stamped or engraved charms, all designed so that they can be worn alone or layered.

Brass cuff with small spikes.  Gold plated finish.

Perfect for stacking!

name: SLEET JUMPER
description:
Refashioned is made from vintage garments or dead stock fabrics, so they are all unique one-of-a-kind pieces. These items are sent out for a special washing process, and then carefully reworked.  

No two are exactly alike due to the nature of the raw materials we use. Styles may vary slightly in color, texture, finishing or weight from the item pictured on our site. We group our prints and colors by type, so you will not get exactly the same item as pictured. You will however get something very close!  

Our top priority is making sure our customers are happy with our product. If you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase, please feel free to contact your concierge or return it- on us!

Get ready to feel like a lean, mean, summer time machine in this one.  The Sleet Jumper not only makes you look longer and slimmer it also is really easy to wear.  We love a good jumpsuit. This is a long jumpsuit with a flared wide leg and is fitted through the bodice and waist.  The front bodice has a low v and the back has a cut out above the waist, this one will cover your bras ladies.

Model is 5'8" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size XS:

Bodice Length: 16.25"
 
Bust: 29"
 
Waist: 26"
 
Rise: 12.5"
 
Inseam: 32"
 
Made in our sunny Los Angeles factory.

name: HERA JACKET
description:
Refashioned is made from vintage garments or dead stock fabrics, so they are all unique one-of-a-kind pieces. These items are sent out for a special washing process, and then carefully reworked.  

No two are exactly alike due to the nature of the raw materials we use. Styles may vary slightly in color, texture, finishing or weight from the item pictured on our site. We group our prints and colors by type, so you will not get exactly the same item as pictured.  You will however get something very close!  

Our top priority is making sure our customers are happy with our product. If you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase, please feel free to contact your concierge or return it- on us!

We love reworking army jackets. The great thing about the Hera is its versatility. We decided to cut the sleeves off and make them lace to make it more Ref. We've been known to throw it over a fabulous dress (like the Citrine for example) to play down a look, or over gym clothes for some nonchalant awesomeness. Either way, it just works. Like most of our gear, no two jackets are the same. Sourced in the USA.  Made in our Los Angeles studio.

Please note.  Styles may vary slightly in color, texture, finishing or print from the item pictured on our site. Please read About Me for more details.

name: LEILANI BISHOP LILAC
description:
Capturing the full-bodied scent of lilacs in bloom, sexy and joyful in the breeze.  The delicate nature of the lilac is softly feminine, yet empowering.  A scent that soothed my transition to the East Coast from Hawaii.

10 ml.

Perfume is the ultimate luxury accessory.  Leilani Bishop fragrances are single note perfume oils that are alcohol free, so no headaches, and no over powering smells.  They work with your body chemistry to create a scent that is unique to you.  So, not only do you get to smell amazing you also get to feel special.  It's a win win.

name: LEILANI BISHOP ORANGE BLOSSOM OIL
description:
Perfume is the ultimate luxury accessory. Leilani Bishop fragrances are single scent perfume oils that are alcohol free, so no headaches, and no overpowering smells. They work with your body chemistry to create a scent that is unique to you. So, not only do you get to smell amazing you also get to feel special. It's a win win.

Tangy and clean with a trace of sweet, the Leilani Bishop Orange Blossom fragrance encompasses the whole of the tree from the leaves to the flowers and fruit. Capturing the alluring scent of a Mediterranean orange grove, its just as grounding as it is exhilarating. 

Non-alcohol based, paraben, sulfate, and phosphate free. Reusable packaging.

Comes in a 10 ml. tube.

Made in the USA!

name: LEILANI BISHOP PIKAKE OIL
description:
Perfume is the ultimate luxury accessory. Leilani Bishop fragrances are single note perfume oils that are alcohol free, so no headaches, and no overpowering smells. They work with your body chemistry to create a scent that is unique to you. So, not only do you get to smell amazing you also get to feel special. It's a win win.

Known as the "Hawaiian Jasmine" the intoxicating scent of this tiny white blossom is sweet and musky, laced with the fragrance of the Islands.  Labeled the "Flower of Love" by a Hawaiian princess, the Pikake is a true part of Hawaii's heritage and evokes in me the "Spirit of Aloha".

Non-alcohol based, paraben, sulfate, and phosphate free. Reusable packaging. 

Comes in 10 ml. tube.

Made in the USA!

category: Categories -> CLOTHES,Categories -> CLOTHES -> BOTTOMS,Categories -> STORIES -> REWORKED
name: CURATED LEATHER SHORTS
description:
Our curated collection is one-of-a-kind repurposed vintage.  We hand pick these styles and give them our Reformation touch.  These items are for the adventurous ref babe who is looking for a great statement piece that nobody else will have!

Why throw something away when you can save it and make it better? The Curated Leather Shorts are made from vintage leather pants that were maybe just, ehh. We cut them up, and refit them to bring you a short you simply can't live with out. These are fitted leather hot shorts. Because they are re-worked vintage, each pair varies slightly.

Made from vintage leather.

Rebecca is 5'9" and wearing size S.

Measurements of a size S:

Waist: 27 - 28"

Rise: 9.5 - 11"

Made in sunny Los Angeles!

Why throw something away when you can save it and make it better? The Curated Leather Shorts are made from vintage leather pants that were maybe just, ehh. We cut them up, and refit them to bring you a short you simply can't live with out. These are fitted leather hot shorts. Because they are re-worked vintage, each pair varies slightly.

Made from vintage leather.

Rebecca is 5'9" and wearing size S.

Measurements of a size S:

Waist: 27 - 28"

Rise: 9.5 - 11"

Made in sunny Los Angeles!

name: TSUNAMI DRESS
description:
Refashioned is made from vintage garments or dead stock fabrics, so they are all unique one-of-a-kind pieces. These items are sent out for a special washing process, and then carefully reworked.  

No two are exactly alike due to the nature of the raw materials we use. Styles may vary slightly in color, texture, finishing or weight from the item pictured on our site. We group our prints and colors by type, so you will not get exactly the same item as pictured. You will however get something very close!  

Our top priority is making sure our customers are happy with our product. If you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase, please feel free to contact your concierge or return it- on us!

name: BOWERY SKIRT
description:
Meet our eco-chic dream. This insanely soft beauty is made out of renewable resources. While making fabrics like cotton can release a lot of junk into the environment, this one was made in a closed-loop system without nasty byproducts and with minimal water. By purchasing fabrics like this instead of cotton, you can make the world a little bit cleaner.

The best way to breeze into any room is wearing the Bowery Skirt. It says, "Oh hey, I'm just a super elegant lady who casually threw on this amazing skirt and happen to float before your eyes." This is a maxi A-line skirt, so it fits at the waist and hips and then flares out. It features a high side slit, but you can move it around to have the slit go just about anywhere.

Made from 100% viscose fabric.

Rebecca is 5’8” and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size S:

Length: 39.5”

Waist: 26”

Made in sunny Los Angeles!

This is made from vintage silk garments so they are all unique one-of-a-kind pieces.  These items are sent out for a special washing process, and then carefully reworked.  No two are exactly alike due to the nature of the raw materials we use.  Styles may vary slightly in color, texture, finishing or weight from the item pictured on our site.  We group our prints and colors by type, so you will not get exactly the same item as pictured.  You will get something very similar!

The Asteroid Jacket is an open jacket with fringe detail throughout.  Made from surplus silk blend fabric.

Model is 5'9" and is one size fits all.

Measurements:

Length- 33"

Bust- 36"

Loose, easy fit.

Made in the USA.

name: GALAXY JUMPER
description:
Every season, fashion houses have thousands of yards of excess fabric because they miscalculated their fabric needs. Typically this just becomes waste. Come on! We can do better than that. That’s why we use “dead stock” fabric to make garments like this one. By shopping with us you get to look like a total babe and nothing goes to waste. Sustainable and sexy, finally!

FINAL SALE!

We can't get enough of those 1920s and 1930s underpinnings. So often what those ladies had going on underneath was even better than what was on the outside. That's why we made the Galaxy Jumper. This is our version of all of those vintage slip rompers we drool over. This is a loose fitting short jumper with a low v in the front. It has lace trim at the neckline, straps and hem of the shorts. It also comes with a self belt so you can cinch it in and show your curves. Made from surplus rayon blend fabric.

Lera is 5'8 and wearing size XS/S.
 
Measurements of size XS/S:
 
Rise: 21.5"
 
Bust: 35.5"
 
Made in sunny Los Angeles!

category: Categories -> CLOTHES,Categories -> CLOTHES -> TOPS,Categories -> CLOTHES -> REF FAVORITES
name: PAMELA BRALETTE
description:
Fashion is second only to oil as the most polluting industry in the world. Ughhh. How’s a girl supposed be environmentally conscience and still look great? We found a way. Items like this one are made from repurposed vintage garments that have been carefully selected. You get to not only look amazing but feel amazing about the choices you’re making. Hot stuff.

The Pamela Top is an OG Reformation staple. It's ideal for wearing under sheer pieces, pairing with overalls, or for the bold, as a top. This is a bra/cami top made from power mesh. The back features a hook and eye closure. The fit is snug to hold you together.

Christy is 5'9" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size S:

Length: 6"

Bust: 24"

Made in sunny Los Angeles!

This is made from vintage cashmere garments so they are all unique one-of-a-kind pieces.  These items are sent out for a special washing process, and then carefully reworked.  No two are exactly alike due to the nature of the raw materials we use.  Styles may vary slightly in color, texture, finishing or weight from the item pictured on our site.  We group our prints and colors by type, so you will not get exactly the same item as pictured.  You will get something very similar!

The Ruby Sweater is a pull-over sweater featuring cross detail on front.  Made from vintage cashmere garments.

Model is 5'9" and this sweater is one size fits all.

Measurements:

Length- 20.5"

Bust- 25" - 29"

Loose, easy fit.

Made in the USA.

name: LUPINE DRESS
description:
Every season, fashion houses have thousands of yards of excess fabric because they miscalculated their fabric needs. Typically this just becomes waste. Come on! We can do better than that. That’s why we use this “dead stock” fabric to make garments like this one. By shopping with us you get to look like a total babe and nothing goes to waste. Sustainable and sexy, finally!

FINAL SALE!

This long, mermaid fit dress features a straight neckline with double strap detail.  Fits true to size.

Made from surplus rayon ghost crepe fabric.

Model is 5'9" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size S:

Length: 51"

Waist: 26"

Made in sunny Los Angeles!

This is made from surplus material so they are all unique one-of-a-kind pieces.  These items are sent out for a special washing process, and then carefully reworked.  No two are exactly alike due to the nature of the raw materials we use.  Styles may vary slightly in color, texture, finishing or weight from the item pictured on our site.  We group our prints and colors by type, so you will not get exactly the same item as pictured.  You will get something very similar!

This long, mermaid fit dress features a straight neckline with double strap detail.  The Lupine Dress is made from surplus rayon ghost crepe fabric.

Model is 5'9" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size small:

Length- 51"

Waist- 26"

Fits true to size.

Made in the USA.

*Final Sale!

This is made from surplus material so they are all unique one-of-a-kind pieces.  These items are sent out for a special washing process, and then carefully reworked.  No two are exactly alike due to the nature of the raw materials we use.  Styles may vary slightly in color, texture, finishing or weight from the item pictured on our site.  We group our prints and colors by type, so you will not get exactly the same item as pictured.  You will get something very similar!

A-line dress featuring scoop neck and side cutout detail. Made from surplus rayon fabric.

Model is 5'8.5" and wearing size XS/S.

Measurements of an XS/S:

Length- 32"

Bust- 37.25

Loose, easy fit.

Made in the USA.

name: CITRINE DRESS
description:
We like to feel good and look good. We want you to feel good too. This garment is made from "dead stock" fabric, leftovers from fashion houses that aren't being used. This way you can look great, but also feel great about the choices you are making. Eco babe.

One of our all time greatest hits. The Citrine Dress is a power house. With its' sexy low neck and deep V in the back, it's the easiest thing in the world to throw on to stop traffic. This is a one size fits all maxi with spaghetti strap detailing and a tie at the waist. Eat whatever you want in it because no one can tell.

Made from surplus rayon blend fabrics.

Lera is 5'7" and this dress is O/S.

Measurements:

Length: 45.5"

Bust: 36"

Made in sunny Los Angeles!

name: NECTAR DRESS
description:
Every season, fashion houses have thousands of yards of excess fabric because they miscalculated their fabric needs. Typically this just becomes waste. Come on! We can do better than that. That’s why we use this “dead stock” fabric to make garments like this one. By shopping with us you get to look like a total babe and nothing goes to waste. Sustainable and sexy, finally!

FINAL SALE!

Made from surplus rayon blend fabric.

Model is 5'8.5" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size S:

Length: 33.25"

Bust: 31.5"

Made in sunny Los Angeles!

That’s why we use this “dead stock” fabric to make garments like this one. By shopping with us you get to look like a total babe and nothing goes to waste. Sustainable and sexy, finally!

FINAL SALE!

The Sapphire Jumper features a V-front, flowy arms, and open back. Loose, easy fit.

Made from surplus rayon blend fabric.

Model is 5’8" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size S:

Rise: 21.75"

Bust: 35.5"

Made in sunny Los Angeles!

name: PANTHER SKIRT
description:
Over 90 million items of clothing end up in a landfill each year. We think that’s garbage.  We want to bring you not only the most environmentally friendly option, but also the cutest. That’s why items like this Panther Skirt are made from repurposed vintage leather. Nothing goes to waste, and you get to be chic. Being green looks great on you.

The Panther Skirt is a power skirt. You know you're a force, now you can let everybody else know, too.  And who doesn’t love a little bit of leather? This is a mini pencil skirt with a little slit at the front princess seam. There's no better way to show your stems than with this mini. Wardrobe staple coming your way. 

Limited edition, and extra special.

Model is 5'8" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size small:

Length- 14.75"

Waist- 27.5"

Made in our sunny Los Angeles factory.

name: CAMELLIA DRESS
description:
This is made from surplus material so they are all unique one-of-a-kind pieces.  These items are sent out for a special washing process, and then carefully reworked.  No two are exactly alike due to the nature of the raw materials we use.  Styles may vary slightly in color, texture, finishing or weight from the item pictured on our site.  We group our prints and colors by type, so you will not get exactly the same item as pictured.  You will get something very similar!

Length- 33.5"

Waist- 25"

Bust- 30"

Fits true to size.

Made in the USA.

name: RAP MUSIC SWEATSHIRT
description:
Reformation has teamed up with Downtown NYC designer Eddie Eddie by Billy Tommy for a capsule collection. We fell in love with Eddie Eddie's one-of-a-kind handcrafted anti-fashion fashions and knew a collaboration would be the perfect juxtaposition to the Reformation aesthetic.

With its kitschy and uncompromising aesthetic, the five piece collection provides just the right dose of satirical playfulness we all need. Whether it's the embroidered vintage cashmere sweater paying tribute to singer Aaliyah or the mini lace backpack reminiscent of your 90's adolescense, Reformation x Eddie Eddie offers a fresh alternative to your spring wardrobe.

As the first piece of our collaboration with Eddie Eddie by Billy Tommy, this isn't your ordinary sweatshirt. Signature super soft Ref sweatshirt made from a cotton/poly blend. This is a unisex sweatshirt, and measurements vary slightly within sizes. Limited quantities available!

Also available in black and navy.

Measurements of an XS/S:

Length- 20"+

Bust- 35"-45"

Oversize fit.

Made in the USA.

This is a vintage silk garment so they are all unique one-of-a-kind pieces.  These items are sent out for a special washing process, and then carefully reworked.  No two are exactly alike due to the nature of the raw materials we use.  Styles may vary slightly in color, texture, finishing or weight from the item pictured on our site.  We group our prints and colors by type, so you will not get exactly the same item as pictured.  You will get something very similar!

The Blossom Top features a V front and gathered cap sleeves. Vintage silk blouse.

Model is 5'8" and wearing size XS.

Measurement of a size small:

Length- 22"-26"

Bust- 35"-38"

Fits true to size.

Made in the USA.

*Final Sale!

category: Categories -> CLOTHES,Categories -> CLOTHES -> BOTTOMS,Categories -> STORIES -> REWORKED
name: JAGUAR SKIRT
description:
Over 90 million items of clothing end up in a landfill each year. We think that’s garbage. We want to bring you not only the most environmentally friendly option, but also the cutest. That’s why items like this one are made from repurposed vintage leather. Nothing goes to waste and you get to be chic. Being green looks great on you.

Want to look like a sexy black cat? Just get the Jaguar Skirt. It's a cute little A-line thing, but it's leather so it's got some extra meow. This is a flared mini skirt with a center front zip. It's short, kicky, and sits at the waist. Serious cattitude.

Made from vintage leather, so each is a little bit different!

Jen is 5'8" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size S:

Waist: 26.5"

Length: 15.5"

Made in sunny Los Angeles!

Want to look like a sexy black cat? Just get the Jaguar Skirt. It's a cute little A-line thing, but it's leather so it's got some extra meow. This is a flared mini skirt with a center front zip. It's short, kicky, and sits at the waist. Serious cattitude.

Made from vintage leather, so each is a little bit different!

Jen is 5'8" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size S:

Waist: 26.5"

Length: 15.5"

Made in sunny Los Angeles!

This is made from surplus material so they are all unique one-of-a-kind pieces.  These items are sent out for a special washing process, and then carefully reworked.  No two are exactly alike due to the nature of the raw materials we use.  Styles may vary slightly in color, texture, finishing or weight from the item pictured on our site.  We group our prints and colors by type, so you will not get exactly the same item as pictured.  You will get something very similar!

The Dipper Top is a short sleeve mesh jersey-inspired top featuring contrast leather on the sleeves. Made from surplus leather and nylon blend fabric.

Model is 5'8.5" and wearing size XS/S.

Measurements of an XS/S:

Length: 27.5"

Bust: 39.5"

Oversize fit.

Made in the USA.

name: GUPPIE TEE
description:
This is made from surplus material so they are all unique one-of-a-kind pieces.  These items are sent out for a special washing process, and then carefully reworked.  No two are exactly alike due to the nature of the raw materials we use.  Styles may vary slightly in color, texture, finishing or weight from the item pictured on our site.  We group our prints and colors by type, so you will not get exactly the same item as pictured.  You will get something very similar!

Sometimes you just want to feel like a tough guy.  The Guppie Tee can help.  It shows that you are ready to hop on that motorcycle and ride into the sunset, or just look bad ass while running errands on a Saturday. This is a vintage t-shirt put threw a special wash to give it a super lived in look (ripped up and ready).  That way you can look like it's been yours for 20 years with out having to put in the time. Fits loose and easy.

Made from vintage t-shirts.

Christy is 5'8" and wearing size XS/S.

Measurements of a size XS/S:

Length: 24 - 28"

Bust: 38 - 41"

Made in sunny Los Angeles!

name: ALMOND DRESS
description:
Every season, fashion houses have thousands of yards of excess fabric because they miscalculated their fabric needs. Typically this just becomes waste. Come on! We can do better than that. That’s why we use this “dead stock” fabric to make garments like this one. By shopping with us you get to look like a total babe and nothing goes to waste. Sustainable and sexy, finally!

FINAL SALE!

Made from surplus rayon blend fabric.

Length: 35"

Bust: 35.5"

name: DIAMOND DRESS
description:
We believe that eco clothing doesn't have to be frumpy.  We want you to feel gorgeous, but still be able to make a choice that's right for the environment.  That's why all our clothes are made of "dead stock" fabric, excess fabric that was over ordered from other fashion houses and just going to waste.  The environmental impact of our clothes is low, but the impact you will make in them is off the charts.

The Diamond Dress will add a lot to your wardrobe. Say you need something to wear to a party, check.  Say you need something to wear to a brunch, check.  Say you just need something to make you feel good and twirl around in, check and check. This is a halter-style fit and flare mini dress with a draped criss-cross at the neck and a low key hole at the center back. Made from surplus rayon blend fabric.

Limited edition cut of 16 (feeling it).

Model is 5'8.5" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size small:

Length: 31.5"

Waist: 25.75"

Bust: 36.5"

Made in our sunny Los Angeles factory.

name: POLLEN SHORTS
description:
Over 90 million items of clothing end up in a landfill each year. We think that's garbage. We want to bring you not only the most environmentally friendly option, but also the cutest. That's why items like this one are made from repurposed vintage leather. Nothing goes to waste and you get to be chic. Being green looks great on you.

Hey, get back in the game. The Pollen Shorts will give you the feel of gym shorts from 1972, but they're leather, so it's even better. These are elastic waist leather shorts with an athletic shaped hem. The fit is mini, but not tight.

Made from surplus leather.

Rebecca is 5'8" and wearing size XS/S.

Measurements of size XS/S:

Front rise: 11"

Inseam: 2"

Waist: 25.5"

Made in sunny Los Angeles!

name: CHARLES DRESS
description:
Fashion is the second largest user of water in the world. We aren't into that. We try and eliminate our water using "dead stock" fabric, basically other people's left overs and making it into the garments you love, like this Charles Dress. One man's trash is our treasure. Nothing feels better than being eco chic.

Sometimes a dress really can change how you feel for the better.  Brighten your day with the Charles Dress.  She's there for you. This backless maxi dress is actually a really easy fit that just skims your body rather than squeezing it.  

Made from surplus rayon blend fabric.

Christy is 5'8" and wearing size XS.
 
Measurements of a size S:
 
Length: 54.5"
 
Waist: 28"
 
Made in sunny Los Angeles!

description:
This is made from surplus material so they are all unique one-of-a-kind pieces.  These items are sent out for a special washing process, and then carefully reworked.  No two are exactly alike due to the nature of the raw materials we use.  Styles may vary slightly in color, texture, finishing or weight from the item pictured on our site.  We group our prints and colors by type, so you will not get exactly the same item as pictured.  You will get something very similar!

The Tahiti Jumper is a two-piece jumper featuring wide leg, flattering pants and a cropped, long sleeve top with tie in back. Made from surplus rayon blend fabric.

Model is 5'8.5" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size small:

Bodice: 16.25"

Front Rise: 11"

Inseam: 32"

Bust: 29"

Waist: 28"

Tighter fit.

Made in the USA.

name: ODETTE KLAIA RING
description:
Odette New York is a Brooklyn-based jewelry line inspired by organic and industrial shapes, natural specimens, artifacts and primitive forms; made using ancient and modern wax carving techniques and hand fabrication. With an emphasis on artistry and craft, each design begins from a pencil sketch that is carefully translated by hand into wax like a small scale sculpture before being cast into materials as varied as recycled sterling silver, brass, bronze, diamonds, and 14K gold.

Thin sterling silver band with an open mountain peak, first carved from wax by hand then cast in recycled sterling silver.

Made in New York City.

Also available in brass.

name: RETROSUPERFUTURE GIAGUARO PUMA SUNGLASSES
description:
SUPER, by RETROSUPERFUTURE®, ignited the phenomenon of acetate sunglasses. They are made in multiple color graduations, which has generated a big trend starting in 2007. Super is the 1rst brand to produce a complete range of colorful fashion sunglasses combining these characteristics together with a very high quality manufacturing process. SUPER sunglasses are made to the highest possible standards, hand made in Italy by the best manufacturers and with the best materials.

Silver detailing on the arms and a delicate silver bar across the front of the model add an old-school elegance, while the rare matte acetate is a result of much research, giving these shades an unmistakably contemporary vibe.

name: RETROSUPERFUTURE LUCIA BLACK SUNGLASSES
description:
SUPER, by RETROSUPERFUTURE®, ignited the phenomenon of acetate sunglasses.  A wide range of colors and to die for shapes make these the missing piece to any great look. SUPER sunglasses are made to the highest possible standards, hand made in Italy by the best manufacturers and with the best materials. For this reason, SUPER also decided to adopt ZEISS lenses, which guarantee an extremely high level of protection to the eyes in all conditions. So your eyes look great and feel great. Great deal.

Designed for women, characterized by a petit and extremely thin frame, yet boasts an extremely strong design and Giotto-esque round lens.

name: SORACE/D KNUCKLE LOVER RING
description:
SORACE/D is a Brooklyn-based boutique jewelry and perfume line inspired by nature, industry, and other realms that beautifully combine a passion for environmental mindfulness with artistry and craft. Each design begins with a sketch that is translated by hand into a wax sculpture or metalwork creation and then is cast from FCS certified recycled gold and silver. The perfume oils are hand-poured to capture a memory or place using organic and wild-crafted oils. All are proudly made in New York, with love.

Knuckle tattoos aren't right for everyone, but knuckle rings definitely are. This SORACE/D "Lover" Knuckle Ring is a great is a great way to express yourself without having to get permanently inked. This ring is made from a mold that's carved in wax and cast in recycled sterling silver de-ox so it's non-tarnishing. Love it.

Ring is available in size 3 (knuckle).

Made in Brooklyn, New York!

name: SORACE/D KNUCKLE OUI RING
description:
SORACE/D is a Brooklyn-based boutique jewelry and perfume line inspired by nature, industry, and other realms that beautifully combine a passion for environmental mindfulness with artistry and craft. Each design begins with a sketch that is translated by hand into a wax sculpture or metalwork creation and then is cast from FCS certified recycled gold and silver. The perfume oils are hand-poured to capture a memory or place using organic and wild-crafted oils. All are proudly made in New York, with love.

Oui oui! All you need to do is say yes to this one. The SORACE/D "Oui" Knuckle Ring couldn't be more right. This ring is made from a mold that is carved in wax and cast in recycled sterling silver de-ox, so its non-tarnishing.  

Ring is available in size 3 (knuckle ring).

Made in Brooklyn, New York!

name: COBRA SOCIETY TASSEL LIGHTER
description:
Like its namesake, Cobra Society’s luxury accessories evoke a heritage of ancient times; honoring traditional and handcrafted Moroccan artistry with the lasting quality, structure and street style for today’s fearless fashion influencers. Virtuous materials and composition are the cornerstone of Cobra Society’s unique luxury: beautifully designed, lastingly constructed, versatile and timeless. Enjoy Cobra Society in the city, at the souk, in the country, or at the beach.

Antique lighter with teal tassel. The perfect accessory to carry with you at all times.

Also available in black!

name: LE FEU DE L'EAU DE ROUGES
description:
Two friends, Jo Strettell and Wendy Polish created the high end candle line, LE FEU DE L'EAU, which translates as The Fire Of The Water. Inspired by the "fantasy candle" of the late 60's. The candles are created without using a mold. They are sculpted with the use of water.

"The Fire Of Red"

Garden rose scent, perfect for your home, office, or anywhere else you enjoy your day.

Each candle is sculpted under water with a high temperature wax. The color is hand mixed and the fragrances are custom blended into a soy candle filling.

Dimension: 3.5" x 4" / 16 oz.

Approximate burn time: 80 hours

name: RGB FOUNDATION NAIL POLISH
description:
Nail Foundation, the inaugural collection consists of a compilation of four skin tone specific, opaque nude nail colors, which offer full, flawless coverage. Inspired by foundation for the face, Nail Foundation colors were precisely matched to top cosmetic foundation shades used by leading makeup artists. Available in four shades - F1  F2  F3  F4 -, each can be applied with two coats or worn under a favorite neutral for a custom blend that covers imperfections and enhances the skin’s natural tones.

Nail foundation in F2. Light to medium opaque creme.

Adding hints of warmth; a universal match for medium skin tones.

0.40 fl oz.

No formaldehyde, no toluene, no DBP, no formaldehyde resin, no camphor.

Made in the USA. Cruelty free.

name: RAP MUSIC SWEATSHIRT
description:
Reformation has teamed up with Downtown NYC designer Eddie Eddie by Billy Tommy for a capsule collection. We fell in love with Eddie Eddie's one-of-a-kind handcrafted anti-fashion fashions and knew a collaboration would be the perfect juxtaposition to the Reformation aesthetic.

With its kitschy and uncompromising aesthetic, the five piece collection provides just the right dose of satirical playfulness we all need. Whether it's the embroidered vintage cashmere sweater paying tribute to singer Aaliyah or the mini lace backpack reminiscent of your 90's adolescense, Reformation x Eddie Eddie offers a fresh alternative to your spring wardrobe.

As the first piece of our collaboration with Eddie Eddie by Billy Tommy, this isn't your ordinary sweatshirt. Signature super soft Ref sweatshirt made from a cotton/poly blend. This is a unisex sweatshirt, and measurements vary slightly within sizes. Limited quantities available!

Also available in black and heather.

Measurements of an XS/S:

Length- 20"+

Bust- 35"-45"

Oversize fit.

Made in the USA.

name: CITRINE DRESS
description:
We like to feel good and look good. We want you to feel good too. This garment is made from "dead stock" fabric, leftovers from fashion houses that aren't being used. This way you can look great, but also feel great about the choices you are making. Eco babe.

One of our all time greatest hits. The Citrine Dress is a power house. With its sexy low neck and deep V in the back, it's the easiest thing in the world to throw on to stop traffic. This is a one size fits all maxi with spaghetti strap detailing and a tie at the waist. Eat whatever you want in it because no one can tell. Made from surplus rayon blend fabrics.

Model is 5'8.5" and dress is one size.

Measurements:

Length- 45.5"

Bust- 36"

Loose, easy fit.

Made in the USA.

name: ORCA DRESS
description:
Reformation has teamed up with Downtown NYC designer Eddie Eddie by Billy Tommy for a capsule collection. We fell in love with Eddie Eddie's one-of-a-kind handcrafted anti-fashion fashions and knew a collaboration would be the perfect juxtaposition to the Reformation aesthetic.

With its kitschy and uncompromising aesthetic, the five piece collection provides just the right dose of satirical playfulness we all need. Whether it's the embroidered vintage cashmere sweater paying tribute to singer Aaliyah or the mini lace backpack reminiscent of your 90's adolescense, Reformation x Eddie Eddie offers a fresh alternative to your spring wardrobe.

name: LUIGI JUMPER
description:
This jumpsuit is made from "dead stock" fabric. That means fabric that was left over and not used from large fashion houses. We are taking the left overs and bringing you something gorgeous as well environmentally friendly. So you can be the sexiest AND the greenest girl at the party. Whoop!

We got your back ladies. The Luigi Jumper is the perfect jumpsuit, just zip it up and you're good to go. No thought necessary. This is a backless, wide disco style leg jumper with criss-cross spaghetti straps in the back. It's perfect for dancing any hour of the day. Made from surplus rayon/spandex blend fabric.

Model is 5'9.5" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size small:

Waist: 26.5"

Bodice Length: 13"

Rise: 11.5"

Inseam: 34.5"

Limited edition cut of 39 (just do it).

Made in our sunny Los Angeles factory.

name: CITRINE DRESS
description:
We like to feel good and look good. We want you to feel good too. This garment is made from "dead stock" fabric, leftovers from fashion houses that aren't being used. This way you can look great, but also feel great about the choices you are making. Eco babe.

One of our all time greatest hits. The Citrine Dress is a power house. With its sexy low neck and deep V in the back, it's the easiest thing in the world to throw on to stop traffic. This is a one size fits all maxi with spaghetti strap detailing and a tie at the waist. Eat whatever you want in it because no one can tell. Made from surplus rayon blend fabrics.

Web exclusive floral print!

Also available in teal, white, dots, and black.

Model is 5'8.5" and dress is one size.

Measurements:

Length- 45.5"

Bust- 36"

Limited edition cut of 9 (no snoozing).

Made in sunny Los Angeles.

name: LADYBUG DRESS
description:
Hey we make all our clothes in the most environmentally sustainable way we possibly can. That means we use "dead stock" fabric for a lot of our clothes. Basically, huge fashion houses have tons of fabric that they over buy season to season, and we swoop up this waste and make killer dresses for you. We like to treat you special.

We've got spring fever big time! The Ladybug Dress has been driving us crazy, we think it will do the same for you. This is a flutter sleeve maxi dress with a slight fish tail at the skirt and the best back detail of the season. Come on! Made from surplus rayon blend fabric.

Web exclusive colorway!

Model is 5'9.5" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size small:

Length: 60.5"

Bust: 31"

Limited edition cut of 5 (get into it).

Made in our sunny Los Angeles factory.

name: CHARLES DRESS
description:
Fashion is the second largest user of water in the world. We aren't into that. We try and eliminate our water using "dead stock" fabric, basically other people's left overs and making it into the garments you love, like this Charles Dress. One man's trash is our treasure. Nothing feels better than being eco chic.

Sometimes a dress really can change how you feel for the better. Brighten your day with the Charles Dress. She's there for you. This backless maxi dress is actually a really easy fit that just skims your body rather than squeezing it. Made from surplus rayon blend fabric.

Model is 5'8.5" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size small:

Length: 54.5"

Bust: 28"

Limited edition cut of 9 (so you're the hottest one at the party).

Made in our sunny Los Angeles factory.

name: PAPAYA DRESS
description:
We are really happy to share with you that we started developing our own eco fabrics. That means fabrics made with as little environmental impact as possible. It's the best when you can feel great about the way you look and feel great about the choices you make. You looking hot is basically helping the earth.

We want to wear this dress all the time. It's like the dress version of the perfect jean. It goes with everything, you don't have to think about it, it shows off your great parts and hides all your not so great parts. This is a mini shift dress with a racer neck and zipper detail at the back neck. It's a no brainer. Made from surplus rayon blend fabric.

This item is final sale.

Limited edition cut of 17 (totally).

Model is 5'9.5" and wearing size XS/S.

Bust: 35"

Every season, fashion houses have thousands of yards of excess fabric because they miscalculated their fabric needs. Typically this just becomes waste. Come on! We can do better than that. name: BOYS TANK
description:
Fashion is the largest user of water in the world, after the agriculture sector. This really bums us out and that's why we are trying to do something about it. This garment is made of "deadstock" fabric, which means it is eco friendly as well as being really cute.

It's time to get out there on the field and kick some ass. Here's what you wear to do it. Or you wear it to let people know you're ironic and hilarious. Either/or, this tank is doing a lot for you. This is a sheer tank with a loose fit and varsity letter detailing.  Boys time. Made from surplus silk fabric with surplus rayon blend contrast.

This item is final sale.

Model is 5'9.5" and wearing size XS/S.

Measurements of an XS/S:

Length: 26.5"

Bust: 35.5"

Limited edition cut of 29 (just for you).

Made in our sunny Los Angeles factory.

name: PENNY LEGGING
description:
We hate pollution and waste, they are the worst. That's why we try to make each garment as eco friendly as we possibly can. If you want to take your eco chic to the next level cold wash your clothes! 80% of the greenhouse gas emissions from fashion happen after you take a garment home. Wash cold, line dry and use green dry cleaning to minimize reduce your environmental impact.

*Final Sale!

We love football players, so much so that we stole their style and made the Penny Legging. This sexy legging is perfect for running around, jumping around, or just laying around. This is a mid rise thick legging with princess seams, silver zip in the back, and a lace up leather detail at the front. Touch down. Made from a surplus poly/spandex blend with vintage leather.

Model is 5'9.5" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of size small:

Front Rise: 10"

Inseam: 27.75"

Waist: 23"

Made in sunny Los Angeles!

name: SEAHORSE TOP
description:
The best way to feel good is to look good and do good. We are giving you the best chance to do that. By shopping with us you are buying clothes made consciously with little environmental impact. That means garments like this one are made out of dead stock fabric that was essentially going to be thrown away by larger fashion houses. We repurpose this fabric to make you look good and feel even better. You're doing great.

*Final Sale!

We love the 90's and all those crop tops and body-con dresses. The Seahorse Top is the modern way to get the super model look. You can be a super babe too. This is a short sleeved knit crop top with a front cut out and major back drama. Show off your good stuff. Made from surplus poly/spandex blend fabric.

Model is 5' 9.5" and wearing size XS/S.

Bust: 28.75"

Whether it's the embroidered vintage cashmere sweater paying tribute to singer Aaliyah or the mini lace backpack reminiscent of your 90's adolescense, Reformation x Eddie Eddie offers a fresh alternative to your spring wardrobe.

The Money Cash Hoes Sweatshirt is a super soft vintage statement sweatshirt with embroidered letters. Made from vintage cotton/poly blend sweatshirts.

Reformation x Eddie Eddie by Billy Tommy.

Measurements of a size small:

Length: 18"+

Bust: 35" - 40"

Boyfriend fit.

Made in the Reformation factory in sunny Los Angeles.

name: LAVA JACKET
description:
We are always on the quest to find new ways to bring you gorgeous clothes made in the most environmentally friendly way possible.  We are delighted to have found sustainable leather to make these great motorcycle jackets.  That means we can give you those items you are dying for in a way that you can feel really good about. We got you.

We are always trying to think of the perfect basic pieces to any wardrobe. This spring we felt like that was a bad ass leather jacket in fun colors. The Lava Jacket is exactly what we want and we hope exactly what you want too. This is a leather jacket with classic motorcycle detailing and hard wear. It sits at the high hip and is fitted, but not shrunken. Essentially, it's perfect. Made from surplus leather with surplus rayon blend lining. Also available in pink!

Limited edition cut of 13 (don't blow it).

Model is 5'9.5" and wearing size small.

Measurements of a size small:

Length: 21"

Bust: 38"

Made in our sunny Los Angeles factory.

name: PELICAN DRESS
description:
We believe that eco clothing doesn't have to be frumpy.  We want you to feel gorgeous, but still be able to make a choice that's right for the environment.  That's why all our clothes are made of "dead stock" fabric, excess fabric that was over ordered from other fashion houses and just going to waste.  The environmental impact of our clothes is low, but the impact you will make in them is off the charts.

Simple doesn't have to be boring.  The pelican dress is all the ease of a basic with a lot more punch. This is a knit mini dress with bustier-style bra cups and a flared skirt. It's the kind of thing you wear to show people that you are a total babe, but didn't have to think about it.  It just happened that way. Surplus poly/spandex blend fabric.

Limited edition cut of 57 (just do it).

Model is 5'9.5" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size small:

Length: 28.25"

Bust: 27"

Waist: 23.5"

Made in our sunny Los Angeles factory.

name: BALI DRESS
description:
Alright ladies, here's the break down. We hate the idea of hurting the environment, but we also hate the idea of having to look like a burlap sack in order to be Eco. So we did something about it. Garments like this one are made from "dead stock" fabric, which means other fashion houses' waisted leftovers. We want you to be not just a babe, but an Eco babe.   

You know that feeling when you put on a dress and it shows off only what you want it to, and you feel sexy, and chic, and it seems like everything in your life is going to be better when you wear this?  That's the Bali Dress.  This is a mini shift dress with a mock neck and cut outs on either side.  It's an easy/loose fit and bra friendly too! We got you. Made from surplus rayon blend fabric.

Limited edition cut of 17 (good things come in small packages).

Model is 5'9.5" and wearing size XS/S.

Measurements of an XS/S:

Length: 31.75"

Bust: 39"

Made in our sunny Los Angeles factory.

name: LANI SKIRT
description:
The fashion industry is one of the leading polluters in the world. Gross! We're not into that, so we decided to do something about it.  his garment is made from "dead stock" fabric which means fabric that larger fashion houses over ordered and would otherwise go to waste. This way by wearing Reformation you can be a total Eco babe.

This is the best thing that's ever happened to your backside. The Lani Skirt is the most flattering and bodacious pencil skirt around. This is a stretch woven skirt that hits around the knee with a slight high-low hem. The front waist features a yoke with double zipper detailing.  You'll look seriously sexy. Made from surplus rayon/spandex blend fabric.

Limited edition cut of 32 (you have to have it)!

Model is 5'9.5" and wearing size XS.

name: HALO TOP
description:
We want you to have options. That's why we try and bring you clothes that are both chic and sexy, as well as environmentally conscious. There is no reason you can't have it all.  Garments like this one are made from repurposed "dead stock fabric" (basically over ordered and wasted fabric from larger fashion houses). We can give you the clothes you want with out the guilt.

Want to spice up your top game? We got something for you right here. The Halo Top is perfect to dress down or dress up. Either way you're going to look hot. This is a short sleeve knit crop top with two front cut outs at the neck. Made for babes from surplus poly/spandex blend fabric.

Limited edition cut of 27 (just for you)!

Model is 5'9.5" and wearing size XS/S.

Measurements of an XS/S:

Length: 15.5"

Bust: 28"

Made in our sunny Los Angeles factory.

name: WILLOW ROMPER
description:
Waste not want not ladies. This garment is made from "dead stock" fabric that is left over from large fashion houses season to season, basically waste.  We take that waste and make it into garments you will love like the Willow Romper. We got you.    

This jumper works overtime. It can be worn as a slip, throw it under a skirt as body suit, or go all out and wear it on it's own (Rihanna did). This is a loose fitting romper with adjustable spaghetti straps and low V in the back. Romper does not ship with belt.

Made from surplus rayon crepe fabric.

Nellie is 5'9" and wearing size XS/S.

Measurements of a size XS/S:

Length: 27"

Bust: 31.5"

Made in sunny Los Angeles!

name: DUPRE TOP
description:
We try and choose the best option for the environment when making our garments.  This item is made of "dead stock" fabric which is fabric that has been over-ordered and unused by larger fashion houses. If you want to take your eco chic to the next level here's a tip: Line Dry. Air-dry clothes just six months out of the year and save the same energy used in a 15-minute cab ride every morning for 350 days straight. Strap those heels on.

*Final Sale!

We love a good collar, but we might love a sheer blouse even more. Now you can get both. The Dupre Top is perfect for "business sassy" occasions. This is a chiffon short sleeve blouse, with crepe collar and pockets, that conveniently cover what you don't want to show. We're feeling you in this.

Limited edition cut of 28 (don't blow it)!

Model is 5'9.5" and wearing size XS/S.

Measurements of size XS/S:

Length: 24"

Bust: 34.5"

Made in sunny Los Angeles!

name: CAPRI JUMPER
description:
Each year, over 90 million items of clothing end up in a landfill. Bummer! We aren’t into this at all. That’s why items like this one are made from vintage denim that we repurpose into the clothes you want to wear now.  Recycling has never looked better. 

*Final Sale!

We live in overalls. You should, too.  It's just a better life that way.  The Capri Jumper is a denim shorts overall with silver hardware.  Fits loose so you can really explore your space.  Made from repurposed vintage denim.

Limited edition cut of 37 (why wait?).

Model is 5'8" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of size S:

Front rise: 11"

Bust: 32"

Waist: 33"

Made in sunny Los Angeles!

name: FLASH JUMPER
description:
Every season, fashion houses have thousands of yards of excess fabric because they  miscalculated their fabric needs. Typically this just becomes waste.  Come on! We can do better than that. That’s why we use this “dead stock” fabric to make garments like this one.  By shopping with us you get to look like a total babe and nothing goes to waste.  Sustainable and sexy, finally!

FINAL SALE!

If you're a fan of our jumpsuits, this one will really get you. If you're not yet hooked on jumpsuits, this might be the turning point.  The Flash Jumper brings it. This is a backless jumpsuit that is fitted at the waist and hips.  The front features a deep v neckline and the back has adjustable spaghetti straps.  Seriously slinky. Made from surplus rayon blend fabric.

Christy is 5'8" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size small:

Bodice length: 17"

Rise: 11.5"

Inseam: 11.5"

Waist: 26.25"

Made in sunny Los Angeles.

name: PARROT PULLOVER
description:
Fashion is second only to oil as the most polluting industry in the world.  Ughhh. How’s a girl supposed be environmentally conscience and still look great? name: STORM SKIRT
description:
Every season, fashion houses have thousands of yards of excess fabric because they miscalculated their fabric needs. Typically this just becomes waste. Come on! We can do better than that. That’s why we use “dead stock” fabric to make garments like this one. By shopping with us you get to look like a total babe and nothing goes to waste. Sustainable and sexy, finally!

Something with a little class and a little sass for you wardrobe. The Storm Skirt is a Reformation staple that seems to go with just about anything. Whatever you throw at it, this skirt can take it. If you catch yourself spinning in front of the mirror for hours in this one, don't worry, we all do.

Made from surplus rayon blend fabric.

name: CHARLES DRESS
description:
Fashion is the second largest user of water in the world. We aren't into that. We try and eliminate our water using "dead stock" fabric, basically other people's left overs and making it into the garments you love, like this Charles Dress. One man's trash is our treasure. Nothing feels better than being eco chic.

FINAL SALE!

Sometimes a dress really can change how you feel for the better. Brighten your day with the Charles Dress. She's there for you. This backless maxi dress is actually a really easy fit that just skims your body rather than squeezing it. Made from surplus rayon blend fabric.

name: PELICAN DRESS
description:
We believe that eco clothing doesn't have to be frumpy.  We want you to feel gorgeous, but still be able to make a choice that's right for the environment.  That's why all our clothes are made of "dead stock" fabric, excess fabric that was over ordered from other fashion houses and just going to waste.  The environmental impact of our clothes is low, but the impact you will make in them is off the charts.

FINAL SALE!

Simple doesn't have to be boring.  The pelican dress is all the ease of a basic with a lot more punch. This is a knit mini dress with bustier-style bra cups and a flared skirt. It's the kind of thing you wear to show people that you are a total babe, but didn't have to think about it.  It just happened that way. Surplus poly/spandex blend fabric.

Rebecca is 5'8" and wearing size XS.

name: YA'LL SWEATER
description:
Let’s have some real talk. Americans throw away an estimated 68 pounds of clothing per person per year. That’s not awesome. We want to bring you a better option. That’s why our cashmere is hand-cut from vintage garments carefully selected by our buyers. Each piece is transformed, so that no two are exactly alike and nothing goes to waste. We got you.

Do you ever wish you and DMX were homies and he spent Sundays in a rocker embroidering sweaters for you? With the Y'all Sweater, that might not be the reality, but a girl can dream.  This is a long sleeve fitted vintage cashmere sweater with lyrics by the one and only DMX embroidered on the front.  Just something simple with a lot of spice.

Limited edition cut of 34 (dream big).

Model is 5'9.5" and wearing size XS/S.

Length: 19" - 24"

Bust: 31" - 34"

name: DUPRE TOP
description:
We try and choose the best option for the environment when making our garments.  This item is made of "dead stock" fabric which is fabric that has been over-ordered and unused by larger fashion houses. If you want to take your eco chic to the next level here's a tip: Line Dry. Air-dry clothes just six months out of the year and save the same energy used in a 15-minute cab ride every morning for 350 days straight. Strap those heels on.

*Final Sale!

We love a good collar, but we might love a sheer blouse even more. Now you can get both. The Dupre Top is perfect for "business sassy" occasions. This is a chiffon short sleeve blouse, with crepe collar and pockets, that conveniently cover what you don't want to show. We're feeling you in this.

Limited edition cut of 28 (don't blow it)!

category: Categories -> CLOTHES,Categories -> CLOTHES -> TOPS,Categories -> CLOTHES -> BASICS,Categories -> STORIES -> REWORKED
name: MOSS SWEATSHIRT
description:
This is made from surplus material so it's a unique one-of-a-kind piece. This garment was sent out for a special washing process, and then carefully reworked. No two are exactly alike due to the nature of the raw materials we use. Styles may vary slightly in color, texture, finishing or weight from the item pictured on our site. We group our prints and colors by type, so you will not get exactly the same item as pictured. You will get something very similar!

Sometimes you just want to throw on your cozy clothes and live your life. The Moss Sweatshirt is perfect for that. This is a cropped long sleeve sweatshirt with a shaped hem. It's a loose, easy fit but you can still show your mid-drift a little and have a good time.

Made from vintage sweatshirts.

Christy is 5'8" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size S:

Length: 17"

Bust: 38"-43"

Made in sunny Los Angeles!

We can do better than that.   That’s why we use this “dead stock” fabric to make garments like this one.  By shopping with us you get to look like a total babe and nothing goes to waste.  Sustainable and sexy, finally!

Sometimes, you just need a little something sweet in your life. The Apricot Dress is just enough sugar, but with a little bit of that spice we always like. This is a mini fit and flare dress with a scooped neckline and short sleeves with sheering at the shoulder. The skirt is flared and flouncy so you can kick around, no problem.

Web exclusive color! Limited edition cut of 7 (trust us).

Model is 5'8" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size small:

Length: 35"

Bust: 31"

Waist: 25.5"

Made in our sunny Los Angeles factory.

name: PERSIMMON DRESS
description:
Every season, fashion houses have thousands of yards of excess fabric because they miscalculated their fabric needs. Typically this just becomes waste. Come on! We can do better than that. That’s why we use “dead stock” fabric to make garments like this one. By shopping with us you get to look like a total babe and nothing goes to waste. Sustainable and sexy, finally!

The Persimmon Dress is for feeling easy, but looking good. The simple tent shape gives you lots of breathing room, the short flutter sleeves make everyone's arms look great, the low V neckline is flattering and feminine and the mini-shaped hem line gives you legs for days. It's so easy, you won't even notice how amazing you look until you catch a glance in the mirror. But, be careful, you might have a hard time parting with your reflection in this one.

Made from surplus rayon blend fabric.

Rebecca is 5'9" and wearing size XS/S.

Measurements of size a XS/S:

Length: 33.5"

Bust: 37.5"

Made in sunny Los Angeles!

name: CITRINE DRESS
description:
We like to feel good and look good. We want you to feel good too. This garment is made from "dead stock" fabric, left overs from fashion houses that aren't being used. This way you can look great but also feel great about the choices you are making. Eco babe.

One of our all time greatest hits. The Citrine Dress is a power house. Sexy low neck, deep V in the back, the easiest thing in the world to throw on to stop traffic. This is a one size fits all maxi with spaghetti strap detailing and tie at the waist. Eat whatever you want in it, no one can tell. Made from surplus rayon blend fabrics.

Limited edition cut of 33 (this is not a joke).

Model is 5'8" and dress is one size.

Measurements:

Length- 45.5"

Bust- 36"

Made in our sunny Los Angeles factory.

name: CRANBERRY JUMPER
description:
We like to feel good and look good. We want you to feel good too. This garment is made from "dead stock" fabric, left overs from fashion houses that aren't being used. This way you can look great but also feel great about the choices you are making. Eco babe.

Need something for romping around town? We got you. The Cranberry Jumper is inspired by all those 1940s sirens, but luckily now a days, we can show a lot more leg. Go out into the world in style. This is a short, fitted jumper with short sleeves that are sheered at the shoulder and a V-neck line. Waist has a really flattering yoke detail with covered buttons. And the shorts are what we do best, fitted at the hip and flared out ever so slightly at the thigh so your gams look long and lean. You're going to look great.

Limited edition cut of 16 (do it right).

Model is 5'8" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size small:

Bodice length: 14.25"

Rise: 13"

Inseam: 2.5"

Made in our sunny Los Angeles factory.

description:
Every season, fashion houses have thousands of yards of excess fabric because they  miscalculated their fabric needs. Typically this just becomes waste.  Come on! We can do better than that.   That’s why we use this “dead stock” fabric to make garments like this one.  By shopping with us you get to look like a total babe and nothing goes to waste.  Sustainable and sexy, finally!

If you're a fan of our jumpsuits, this one will really get you. If you're not yet hooked on jumpsuits, this might be the turning point.  The Flash Jumper brings it. Ummm, so this is pretty. The Desert Dress makes us think of tan skinned beauties hanging out in Morocco by the pool, and anything that can make you feel like that can't be bad. This is a maxi dress with a long wrap skirt, but let's talk about the top...it has short sleeves that extend from the blouse (which is a loose, but not baggy fit), a low v-neckline that ties in the front so you can show skin in the most relaxed way. I mean, we're dying over this one. Made from surplus rayon blend fabric.

Limited edition cut of 28 (how we do).

We like to feel good and look good. We want you to feel good too. This garment is made from "dead stock" fabric, left overs from fashion houses that aren't being used. This way you can look great but also feel great about the choices you are making. Eco babe.

Catch a breeze and go. The Peru Pant is the perfect thing for warm weather. It's elegant, sexy, and easy. This is a high waisted pant with wide legs and high side slits. Trust us, you'll feel great when you're in them. Made from surplus rayon blend fabric.

Limited edition of 19 (real talk).

Model is 5'9" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size small:

Waist: 28"

Rise: 14.5"

Inseam: 32"

Made in our sunny Los Angeles factory.

name: MACHO CROP TOP
description:
Fashion is second only to oil as the most polluting industry in the world.  Ughhh.  How’s a girl supposed be environmentally conscience and still look great? We found a way.  Items like this one are made from repurposed vintage garments that have been carefully selected so you get to not only look amazing but feel amazing about the choices you’re making.  Hot stuff.

Alright ladies, they said it couldn't be done but here is a seriously sexy sweatshirt. The Macho Crop Top is the best way to get that cozy sweatshirt feel you love but without having to cover it all up. We know you like to let loose now and again. This is a cropped muscle sweatshirt made from washed vintage sweatshirts, so it's extra soft. It's fitted to the body so get ready for double takes.  Since it's vintage, each piece may be a little different.

Made from vintage cotton/poly blend sweatshirts. 

Rebecca is 5'8" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size S:

Length: 15"

Bust: 32"

Made in sunny Los Angeles!

name: WILLOW ROMPER
description:
Waste not want not ladies. This garment is made from "dead stock" fabric that is left over from large fashion houses season to season, basically waste.  We take that waste and make into garments you will love like the Willow Romper. We got you.

This jumper works overtime. It can be worn as a slip, throw it under a skirt as body suit, or go all out and wear it on it's own (Rihanna did). This is a loose fitting romper with adjustable spaghetti straps and a low v in the back. Made from surplus rayon crepe fabric.

**This romper will ship on 4/30!

Web exclusive color!

Limited edition cut of 21 (no snoozing this time).

Model is 5'8" and wearing size XS/S.

Measurements of an XS/S:

Length- 27"

Bust- 31.5"

Made in our sunny Los Angeles factory.

name: QUARTZ DRESS
description:
Meet our special-tees. They're made from insanely soft eco-fabric from renewable resources. While making most fabrics like cotton can release a lot of junk into the environment, this one was made in a closed-loop system without nasty byproducts. By purchasing this tee instead of a cotton one, you can make the world a little bit cleaner.

When we were dreaming about what would be the perfect thing for vacation this dress came to us.  The Quartz Dress is like wearing a t-shirt but about 10 times more elegant. This is a maxi jersey t-shirt dress with a high slit on the thigh.  It has a loose fit.  Wear it on sand or concrete.  It can go with you anywhere. 

Made from 100% tencel eco-fabric.

Rebecca is 5'9" and wearing size XS/S.

Measurements of a size XS/S:

Length: 58"

Bust: 32.5"

Made in sunny Los Angeles!

name: TEN JACKET
description:
Every season, fashion houses have thousands of yards of excess fabric because they  miscalculated their fabric needs. Typically this just becomes waste. Come on! We can do better than that. That’s why we use this “dead stock” fabric to make garments like this one.  By shopping with us you get to look like a total babe and nothing goes to waste. Sustainable and sexy, finally!

Listen, sometimes you just want to give yourself a little affirmation, and what better way to do it than on a jean jacket. The 10 jacket reminds you every time you put it on that, you're a 10. This is a cropped and fitted jean jacket made from vintage Levi's jackets with number 10 in varsity letters on the back. The fit is shrunken so you won't feel like you borrowed your boyfriend's clothes. It will feel like it was made just for you.

Limited edition cut of 24 (cause you're a special lady).

Model is 5'9" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size small:

Length: 17"

Bust: 34"

Made in our sunny Los Angeles factory.

description:
Every season, fashion houses have thousands of yards of excess fabric because they  miscalculated their fabric needs. Typically this just becomes waste. Come on! We can do better than that. That’s why we use this “dead stock” fabric to make garments like this one.  By shopping with us you get to look like a total babe and nothing goes to waste. Sustainable and sexy, finally!

The Persimmon Dress is for feeling easy but looking good.  The simple tent shape of it gives you lots of breathing room. The short flutter sleeves make everyone's arms look great, the low v neck line is flattering and feminine, and the mini shaped hem line gives you legs for days. It's so easy you won't even notice how amazing you look until you catch a glance in the mirror, but be careful you might have a hard time parting with your reflection in this one.

name: FIORE DRESS
description:
Every season, fashion houses have thousands of yards of excess fabric because they  miscalculated their fabric needs. Typically this just becomes waste.  Come on! We can do better than that.   That’s why we use this “dead stock” fabric to make garments like this one.  By shopping with us you get to look like a total babe and nothing goes to waste.  Sustainable and sexy, finally!

Ready for the spring? Not without this dress!  The Fiore Dress is the statement piece to fill out any closet.  The top is feminine and blousey with short sleeves and a v neckline.  The back is cut away above the waist, just high enough to show a little something but low enough to still cover your bra. And let's talk about the skirt.  It's a mermaid fit skirt, so it hugs your curves and then flares just above the knee to give you a knock out silhouette. It also has a center front slit to get some air. Made from surplus rayon blend fabric.

Limited edition cut of 23 (you're a special lady)!

Christy is 5'8" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size small:

Length: 59"

Bust: 38"

Waist: 25.5"

Made in our sunny Los Angeles factory.

We can do better than that.   That’s why we use this “dead stock” fabric to make garments like this one.  By shopping with us you get to look like a total babe and nothing goes to waste.  Sustainable and sexy, finally!

Remain calm.  The Lochness Dress is one of the most gorgeous wrap dresses to come your way.  Elegant, young, easy to throw on, it's just got it all.  You can have it all, too. This is a maxi wrap dress with short sleeves.  The skirt hem is slightly higher in the front and then curves down to be longer at the back.   You're going to spend hours twirling around in front of the mirror in this, but no one can blame you for that.

Made from surplus rayon blend fabric.

Rebecca is 5'9" and wearing size XS/S.

Center back length: 58.5"
 
Bust: 36.5"
 
Waist: 31.5"

category: Categories -> CLOTHES,Categories -> CLOTHES -> TOPS,Categories -> CLOTHES -> BASICS,Categories -> STORIES -> REWORKED
name: MOSS SWEATSHIRT
description:
This is made from surplus material so it's a unique one-of-a-kind piece. This garment was sent out for a special washing process, and then carefully reworked. No two are exactly alike due to the nature of the raw materials we use. Styles may vary slightly in color, texture, finishing or weight from the item pictured on our site. We group our prints and colors by type, so you will not get exactly the same item as pictured. You will get something very similar!

We love cozy clothes, but sometimes you're just not ready to commit to the full comfort look.  The Moss Sweatshirt is perfect, because it is all the ease of a simple sweatshirt, but it's cropped so you can still feel a little sexy in it. This is a long sleeved cropped sweatshirt, made from washed vintage sweatshirts so it's incredible soft. The hem is shaped to be a little shorter in the front than in the back so it's a slight peak at the mid drift, but not a full show. 

Made from vintage sweatshirts.

Rebecca is 5'9" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size S:

Length: 17"

Bust: 38"- 43"

Made in sunny Los Angeles!

name: BETTY BAND
description:
Over 90 million items of clothing end up in a landfill each year. We think that’s garbage.   We  want to bring you not only the most environmentally friendly option, but also the cutest.   That’s why items like this one are made from repurposed vintage leather.  Nothing goes to waste and you get to be chic.  Being green looks great on you.

Made from recycled vintage leather.

description:
Fashion is second only to oil as the most polluting industry in the world.  Ughhh.  How’s a girl supposed be environmentally conscience and still look great? We found a way.  Items like this one are made from repurposed vintage garments that have been carefully selected so you get to not only look amazing but feel amazing about the choices you’re making.  Hot stuff.

Sometimes you just want to feel like a tough guy.  The Guppie Tee can help.  It shows that you are ready to hop on that motorcycle and ride into the sunset, or just look bad ass while running errands on a Saturday. This is a vintage t-shirt put through a special wash to give it a super lived in look (ripped up and ready).  You can look like it's been yours for 20 years without having to put in the time.  Fits loose and easy.

Made from vintage cotton t-shirts.
