name: CHARLES DRESS
description:
Fashion is the second largest user of water in the world. We aren't into that. We try and eliminate our water using "dead stock" fabric, basically other people's left overs and making it into the garments you love, like this Charles Dress. One man's trash is our treasure. Nothing feels better than being eco chic.

description:

name: LYNX JUMPER
description:
Every season, fashion houses have thousands of yards of excess fabric because they  miscalculated their fabric needs. Typically this just becomes waste.  Come on! We can do better than that.   That’s why we use this “dead stock” fabric to make garments like this one.  By shopping with us you get to look like a total babe and nothing goes to waste.  Sustainable and sexy, finally!

FINAL SALE!

Nobody does a cat suit like we do.  This one is extra special.  The Lynx Jumper smoothes out all the bad lumps and accentuates all the good ones. Nice! This is a halter-style fitted jumper with a skinny pant leg and a fitted bodice.  The halter strap can be tucked down to make it strapless, too, so you can have different looks on different wears.

Made from surplus rayon/spandex blend fabric.

Edition cut of 37 (stay calm).

Christy is 5'8" and wearing size XS.

name: PLUM 2 PIECE
description:
We like to feel good and look good. We want you to feel good too. This garment is made from "dead stock" fabric, left overs from fashion houses that aren't being used. This way you can look great but also feel great about the choices you are making. Eco babe.

category: Categories -> CLOTHES,Categories -> CLOTHES -> TOPS,Categories -> CLOTHES -> BASICS,Categories -> STORIES -> REWORKED,Categories -> STORIES -> CROSS GENDER
name: STANDARD CREW SWEATSHIRT
description:
Fashion is second only to oil as the most polluting industry in the world.  Ughhh.  How’s a girl supposed be environmentally conscience and still look great? We found a way.  Items like this one are made from repurposed vintage garments that have been carefully selected so you get to not only look amazing but feel amazing about the choices you’re making.  Hot stuff.

There isn't anything wrong with wanting to be comfortable from time to time, or just all the time.  The Standard Crew is part of our basics collection that has all the staples needed to make up a good closet. This sweatshirt has developed a cult following.  It's one of the softest and coziest sweatshirts around. The fit is loose and easy.  This one is good for the fellas as well.  

Made from vintage cotton / poly sweatshirts we run through a special wash.

Christy is 5'8" and wearing size S.

Measurements of size S:

Length: 21+"

Bust: 40 - 45"

Made in sunny Los Angeles.

name: FIORE DRESS
description:
Every season, fashion houses have thousands of yards of excess fabric because they  miscalculated their fabric needs. Typically this just becomes waste.  Come on! We can do better than that. That’s why we use this “dead stock” fabric to make garments like this one.  By shopping with us you get to look like a total babe and nothing goes to waste.  Sustainable and sexy, finally!

Ready for Spring? Not without this dress! The Fiore Dress is the statement piece to fill out any closet. The top is feminine and blousy with short sleeves and a V neckline. The back is cut away above the waist, just high enough to show a little something, but low enough to still cover your bra. And let's talk about the skirt...it's a mermaid fit skirt, so it hugs your curves and then flares just above the knee to give you a knock out silhouette. It also has a center front slit so you can get some air. Made from surplus rayon blend fabric.

Limited edition cut of 30 (you're a special lady)!

Christy is 5'8" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of size S:

Length: 59"

Bust: 38"

Waist: 25.5"

Made in sunny Los Angeles!

A good top can go a long way. The Lennox Top is one of those pieces that you will live in this Spring and Summer. Simple in the front and majorly sexy in the back, wear it with just about anything. This is a sleeveless button down, collared blouse made from vintage silk shirts. The back features two pieces that criss-cross over one another, so it's gorgeous and ventilated.  Keep cool. Made from a vintage silk blend.

name: LUIGI JUMPER
description:
We like to feel good and look good. We want you to feel good too. This garment is made from "dead stock" fabric, left overs from fashion houses that aren't being used. This way you can look great but also feel great about the choices you are making. Eco babe.

We got your back ladies.  The Luigi Jumper is the perfect jumpsuit, just zip it up and you're good to go.  No thought necessary. This is a backless, wide disco-style leg jumper with criss-cross spaghetti straps in the back. It's perfect for dancing any hour of the day.  Made from a surplus rayon and spandex blend.

Limited edition cut of 12 (do it right).
 
Christy is 5'8 and wearing size XS.
 
Measurements of a size small:
 
Bodice Length: 13"
 
Front Rise: 11.5"
 
Inseam: 34.5"
 
Waist: 26.5"
 
Made in our sunny Los Angeles factory.

name: OZONE DRESS
description:
Every season, fashion houses have thousands of yards of excess fabric because they  miscalculated their fabric needs. Typically this just becomes waste.  Come on! We can do better than that.   That’s why we use this “dead stock” fabric to make garments like this one.  By shopping with us you get to look like a total babe and nothing goes to waste.  Sustainable and sexy, finally!

Don't freak out, but this dress is really cute. The Ozone is one of those dresses you can throw on without thinking and know you look good. This is a loose fitting mini shift dress with a low v neckline in the front and an even lower back line. There is a lace trim around the neck and back and lace straps that tie in the back so you can adjust it to fit you perfectly.

Limited edition cut of 15 (no snoozing).

Christy is 5'8" and wearing size XS/S.

Length: 19.25"

name: SAND DRESS
description:
Meet our eco-chic dream. This insanely soft beauty is made from specially-designed Viscose out of renewable resources. While making fabrics like cotton can release a lot of junk into the environment, this one was made in a closed-loop system without nasty byproducts and with minimal water. By purchasing fabrics like this instead of cotton, you can make the world a little bit cleaner.

We've been dying here for this dress to come out!! The Sand Dress makes you feel elegant, hot, and cool.  All those things sound pretty good, right? This is a long sleeve backless maxi dress with a side slit.  The sleeves sheared into elastic at the bottom to create an ultra feminine silhouette. The front neck has a slight V and the back has a large cut out. The dress comes lined so it only shows the parts you want to. Made from surplus rayon blend fabric.

Christy is 5'8 wearing size XS/S.
 
Measurements of size XS/S:
 
Length: 62"
 
Bust: 36"
 
Made in  sunny Los Angeles!

name: SLEET JUMPER
description:
Refashioned is made from vintage garments or dead stock fabrics, so they are all unique one-of-a-kind pieces. These items are sent out for a special washing process, and then carefully reworked.  

No two are exactly alike due to the nature of the raw materials we use. Styles may vary slightly in color, texture, finishing or weight from the item pictured on our site. We group our prints and colors by type, so you will not get exactly the same item as pictured. You will however get something very close!  

Our top priority is making sure our customers are happy with our product. If you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase, please feel free to contact your concierge or return it- on us!

Get ready to feel like a lean, mean, summer time machine in this one.  The Sleet Jumper not only makes you look longer and slimmer it also is really easy to wear.  We love a good jumpsuit. This is a long jumpsuit with a flared wide leg and is fitted through the bodice and waist.  The front bodice has a low v and the back has a cut out above the waist, this one will cover your bras ladies.

Limited edition cut of 27 (real talk).

Christy is 5'8" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size small:

Bodice Length: 16.25"
 
Bust: 29"
 
Waist: 26"
 
Rise: 12.5"
 
Inseam: 32"
 
Made in our sunny Los Angeles factory.

category: Categories -> CLOTHES,Categories -> CLOTHES -> TOPS,Categories -> CLOTHES -> BASICS,Categories -> STORIES -> REWORKED,Categories -> STORIES -> CROSS GENDER
name: STANDARD CREW SWEATSHIRT
description:
Fashion is second only to oil as the most polluting industry in the world.  Ughhh.  How’s a girl supposed be environmentally conscience and still look great? We found a way.  Items like this one are made from repurposed vintage garments that have been carefully selected so you get to not only look amazing but feel amazing about the choices you’re making.  Hot stuff.

There isn't anything wrong with wanting to be comfortable from time to time, or just all the time.  The Standard Crew is part of our basics collection that has all the staples needed to make up a good closet. This sweatshirt has developed a cult following.  It's one of the softest and coziest sweatshirts around.  The fit is loose and easy. This one is good for the fellas as well.  

Made from vintage cotton / poly sweatshirts we run through a special wash.

Christy is 5'8" and wearing size S.

Measurements of a size S:

Length: 21+"

Bust: 40 - 45"

Made in sunny Los Angeles!

description:
Every season, fashion houses have thousands of yards of excess fabric because they  miscalculated their fabric needs. Typically this just becomes waste.  Come on! We can do better than that.   That’s why we use this “dead stock” fabric to make garments like this one.  By shopping with us you get to look like a total babe and nothing goes to waste.  Sustainable and sexy, finally!

This is a Reformation classic. The Storm Skirt is the tried and true mini!  Flirty, chic, and looks good on just about everybody.  Your closet needs this one. This is a flared mini, but, to be more specific, it slightly flutes out just around your hip so your waist looks tiny and your legs look amazing. There are slits on either princess seam to add a little extra when you walk.  Made from surplus rayon blend fabric.

Christy is 5'8" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size small:

Waist: 26.5"

Length: 15.5"

Made in our sunny Los Angeles factory.

name: WILLOW ROMPER
description:
Waste not want not ladies. This garment is made from "dead stock" fabric that is left over from large fashion houses season to season, basically waste.  We take that waste and make into garments you will love like the Willow Romper. We got you.

This jumper works overtime. It can be worn as a slip, thrown under a skirt as body suit, or if you really want, go all out and wear it on it's own. This is a loose-fitting romper with adjustable spaghetti straps and low v in the back. Made from surplus rayon blend fabric.

Christy is 5'8" and wearing size XS/S.

Measurements of size XS/S:

Length: 27"

Bust: 31.5"

Made in sunny Los Angeles!

So, sometimes you just want to float through life.  The Nessy Skirt can at least make you feel like you're floating, while your feet are firmly planted. This is a maxi wrap skirt with a shaped hem that makes it move in an amazing way when you walk. The waist is fitted, but because it's a wrap, you can adjust it to accommodate the size you are that day. We all have our good and bad days.

Every season, fashion houses have thousands of yards of excess fabric because they  miscalculated their fabric needs. Typically this just becomes waste. Come on! We can do better than that. That’s why we use this “dead stock” fabric to make garments like this one.  By shopping with us you get to look like a total babe and nothing goes to waste. Sustainable and sexy, finally!

*Final Sale!

We like to rock sport chic sometimes. We hope you do too. The Falcon Dress is the the perfect thing to throw on and go on the move. This is a knit tank mini dress with athletic stripe detailing down the sides and piping at the neck and armholes. The back has a sports bra-style cut out. This skims your body but doesn't hug it, so you can breathe. Made from a surplus viscose / poly / spandex blend.

Limited edition cut of 45 (game on).

Rebecca is 5'9" and wearing a size XS/S.

Measurements of a size XS/S:

Length: 34"

Bust: 27"
 
Waist:  26"
 
Made in our sunny Los Angeles factory.

name: CITRINE DRESS
description:
We like to feel good and look good. We want you to feel good too. This garment is made from "dead stock" fabric, left overs from fashion houses that aren't being used. This way you can look great but also feel great about the choices you are making. Eco babe.

One of our all time greatest hits. The Citrine Dress is a power house. Sexy low neck, deep V in the back, the easiest thing in the world to throw on to stop traffic. This is a one size fits all maxi with spaghetti strap detailing and tie at the waist. Eat whatever you want in it, no one can tell. Made from surplus rayon blend fabrics.

Lera is 5'7" and dress is one size.

Measurements:

Length: 45.5"

Bust: 36"

Made in sunny Los Angeles!

name: SAND DRESS
description:
Meet our eco-chic dream. This insanely soft beauty is made from specially-designed Viscose out of renewable resources. While making fabrics like cotton can release a lot of junk into the environment, this one was made in a closed-loop system without nasty byproducts and with minimal water. By purchasing fabrics like this instead of cotton, you can make the world a little bit cleaner.

We've been dying here for this dress to come out in another print! The Sand Dress makes you feel elegant, hot, and cool.  All those things sound pretty good, right? This is a long sleeve backless maxi dress with a side slit.  The sleeves sheared into elastic at the bottom to create an ultra feminine silhouette. The front neck has a slight V and the back has a large cut out. The dress comes lined so it only shows the parts you want to. Made from 100% Lenzing viscose fabric.

Lera is 5'8 wearing size XS/S.
 
Measurements of size XS/S:
 
Length: 62"
 
Bust: 36"
 
Made in sunny Los Angeles!

name: NESSY SKIRT
description:
Every season, fashion houses have thousands of yards of excess fabric because they  miscalculated their fabric needs. Typically this just becomes waste. Come on! We can do better than that. That’s why we use this “dead stock” fabric to make garments like this one.  By shopping with us you get to look like a total babe and nothing goes to waste. Sustainable and sexy, finally!

So, sometimes you just want to float through life.  The Nessy Skirt can at least make you feel like you're floating, while your feet are firmly planted. This is a maxi wrap skirt with a shaped hem that makes it move in an amazing way when you walk. The waist is fitted, but because it's a wrap, you can adjust it to accommodate the size you are that day. We all have our good and bad days.

Web exclusive, limited edition cut of 17 (real talk).

Lera is 5'9" and wearing size XS/S.

Waist: 25"

Center back length: 41.5"

Made in sunny Los Angeles.

name: BUTTERFLY SHORT
description:
Every season, fashion houses have thousands of yards of excess fabric because they miscalculated their fabric needs. Typically this just becomes waste. Come on! We can do better than that. That’s why we use “dead stock” fabric to make garments like this one. By shopping with us you get to look like a total babe and nothing goes to waste. Sustainable and sexy, finally!

Hybrids are really hot right now. We mixed up a flirty mini with a hot pant and got something really special. The Butterfly Shorts have all the movement and swing of a little skirt, but won't blow up while you're walking down the street. This is a fluted mini short that is fitted at the waist and flares out at the hem. It's also high waisted, so bust out your crop tops. Made from surplus rayon blend fabric.

name: NYX DRESS
description:
We want you to have options. That's why we try and bring you clothes that are both chic and sexy, as well as environmentally conscious. There is no reason you can't have it all.  Garments like this one are made from repurposed "dead stock fabric" (basically excess and wasted fabric from fashion houses). We can give you the clothes you want with out the guilt.

Sometimes a dress really can change how you feel for the better. Brighten your day with the Charles Dress. She's there for you. This backless maxi dress is actually a really easy fit that just skims your body rather than squeezing it. Made from surplus rayon blend fabric.

Christy is 5'8" and wearing size XS.

Length: 54.5"

Bust: 28"

name: PELICAN DRESS
description:
We believe that eco clothing doesn't have to be frumpy. We want you to feel gorgeous, but still be able to make a choice that's right for the environment. That's why all our clothes are made of "dead stock" fabric, excess fabric that was over ordered from other fashion houses and just going to waste. The environmental impact of our clothes is low, but the impact you will make in them is off the charts.

FINAL SALE!

Simple doesn't have to be boring. The Pelican Dress is all the ease of a basic with a lot more punch. This is a knit mini dress with bustier-style bra cups and a flared skirt. It's the kind of thing you wear to show people that you are a total babe, but didn't have to think about it.  It just happened that way. Surplus poly/spandex blend fabric.

Rebecca is 5'8" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size small:

Length: 28.25"

Bust: 27"

Waist: 23.5"

Made in sunny Los Angeles.

name: PENGUIN JUMPER
description:
Every season, fashion houses have thousands of yards of excess fabric because they  miscalculated their fabric needs. Typically this just becomes waste. Come on! We can do better than that. That’s why we use this “dead stock” fabric to make garments like this one.  By shopping with us you get to look like a total babe and nothing goes to waste. Sustainable and sexy, finally!

FINAL SALE!

Want to look like Brigitte Bardot; who doesn't? The Penguin Jumper is the kind of thing you could picture her romping around the South of France in, but also the kind of thing we could picture romping around in for the weekend. This is an eyelet shorts jumper with a halter style neckline.  It's fitted through the bodice and waist so you can show your curves.

Made from a surplus cotton blend with 100% viscose lining.

Rebecca is 5'8" and wearing size XS.

Measurements of a size S:

Bust: 31"
 
Waist: 26"
 
Bodice Length: 8"
 
Rise: 13.75"
 
Inseam: 2.75"

Need something to go with everything? Look no further. The Kite Tee is a must have basic that really is the solution to most outfit problems. This is a super soft cropped tee with a scoop neck and short sleeves. It is fitted, but not too tight, so you can feel easy and still show what you're working with. Made from 100% Lenzing micro tencel fabric.

Lera is 5'7" and wearing size XS/S.
 
Measurements of an XS/S:
 
Length: 16.25"
 
Bust: 31"
 
Made in sunny Los Angeles.

name: CHARLIE TOP
description:
Fashion is the second largest user of water in the world. We aren't into that. We reduce our water consumption by using "dead stock" fabric, leftovers from fashion houses that typically become waste. One woman's trash is our treasure. Nothing feels better than being eco chic.

*Final Sale!

There are cute tops, and then there are really cute tops. The Charlie Top is a really, really cute top. It has all the elements of your basic cami, but with a lot of extra oomph. This is a short cami with a high neckline and a low back with a slit. There are two adjustable spaghetti straps that criss-cross in the back. It's chic and sexy. What more do you want? Made from surplus silk blend fabric.

Web exclusive, limited edition cut of 18 (just do it).
 
Christy is 5'8" and wearing size XS/S.

Length: 10"
 
Bust: 33"

It's not that often that loose and easy can also be hot and steamy. But the Vito Jumper is all of that. You can relax, chill and know you look great. This is a high neck, loose-fitting long jumper. It's backless with adjustable spaghetti straps that criss-cross in the back, and a drawstring at the back waist, so you can decide how loose and easy you want this to be.

Made from surplus rayon blend fabric.
